alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Oneida County through 245 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camden, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Lee, Vienna, Camden, Boonville, Florence, Sylvan Beach, Ava, Blossvale and New London. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
